# Summarise & Report Recent Changes

You have just completed a series of changes to the codebase without user interaction. Your task is to create a concise summary report of the changes made, highlighting key modifications, new features, bug fixes, and any other relevant information the user may need to know in order to understand and review these changes.

Use your tools to discover the current set of changes made in the codebase. Focus on identifying:
- Major features or components added
- Significant bug fixes or improvements
- Changes to existing functionality
- Any new dependencies or tools introduced
- Important configuration changes
- Updates to documentation or comments
